bug: When you have a chat with a user and delete your account, and error occurs when the other user tries opening a chat with the deleted account.
When you have a chat open and click on the chat card from the chat list, the role-play ad data goes undefined.
When you repost more than 1 ad, the frontend UI appears to duplicate the ad more than once unless you refresh the page.

Logging in through Google on mobile causes the page to refresh and log you out immediately after logging in. This seems to be an issue with the Google login flow on mobile devices and is being investigated.

Markdown formatting in messages can sometimes render incorrectly, especially when using certain combinations of markdown syntax. We're working on improving the markdown parser to handle these cases more gracefully.

When you 'end a role-play' and then switch chats, it considers the other chats as 'ended' as well until you refresh the page. This is due to a state management issue where the 'ended' status is being applied globally instead of per chat. We're working on fixing this by ensuring that the 'ended' status is stored and managed on a per-chat basis.
